::Prowl::

Prowl frowns as he hears a voice behind him, feeling a tingling 
coming from the orbs mounted into his wings. He could feel the area 
around him, where the bot stood, the shape of the ground, everything. 
This bot was obvioustly not friendly, and Prowl had no idea whether 
his new body had any weapons.

A thought suddenly popped into Prowl's head, a suggestion on what to 
do.

"Prowl, UltraMetal!" he exclaims, jumping and spinning around as he 
does, having no idea what the command would do. Suddenly, he felt 
like he was being ripped apart. His outer skin split (along with the 
feathers and scales), plates emerging from the cracks to replace it. 
Slowly, the skin disspeared completely, leaving Prowl glinting in the 
sun, almost fully covered by metallic armor by the time he lands.

He looked almost like an armored knight, with metallic plates all 
over him. His torso, legs, and arms were completely covered, metalic 
raptor claws in place instead of the artificial material that had 
covered his feet. A half-foot long spike stuck up at each knee, 
glinting in the sun along with the rest of him. His wings, now 
metallic as well, stretched out to either side of him, placing 
themselves between this bot and Iron Raptor.

Prowl's wings were now connected with Prowl's body in three places, 
one near his shoulders, one halfway down his torso, and one to the 
side of the small of his back, but he could detatch the bottom two 
joints to gain manuverability at the sacrifice of some speed. The 
bottom two joints of his wings were attatched to two boosters (one 
for the left wing and one for the right), which were half-buried in 
his back. Two guns were mounted on the underside of each wing, and an 
orb was implanted in each wing, an inch back from the joint.

His arms were also metallic (ain't that surprizing?), his outer 
forearm plates wider than his arm. His slash claws, extended by 
several feet from what they had been in his previous form, were 
folded back to the inside of his left outer forearm plate, ready to 
flip out for battle.

Prowl's neck and head was still covered by the artificial skin, and 
as an afterthought metal plates covered it as well, but that was just 
an extra, though, something that could be enabled and disabled at 
will.

As he lands, the armored Maximal lookes calmly at Shadow, ready for 
battle.

"Do you still want to fight? You can walk away, you know," he says. 
He didn't really want to hurt this bot.

While he talked, his mind was running through his supply of weapons, 
memorizing each one.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
So that it doesn't look like I'm making stuff up in the future, 
here's Prowl's list of weapons (at least the ones he starts out with, 
or will get very soon).

Energy Nunchuks - A pair of nunchuks stored in his right wrist 
compartment, as long as his forearm and with the capacity to expand. 
The nunchucks are translucent, with a opaque band where Prowl can 
hold on to them without having his hand burned through (the band 
changes location to where Prowl wants it). When activated, they emit 
a slight hum and a blue glow, and burn through (or give a severe burn 
to) almost anything they touch, from metal to organic material. They 
can also be used as a power source, and can create a small shield to 
block and absorb some energy attacks. The two parts can also be 
combined into a staff and used that way. The nunchuks need to be 
recharged after heavy use.

Acid Gun - His old acid gun, remaining pretty much the same. It 
shoots highly corrosive acid pellets.

Slash Claws - His old slash claws but now extended by a few inches 
and built into his arm. They edject at a mental command from him, 
ready for battle at any time.

BlueStreak's Daggers - The daggers that his brother left him (he'll 
get them as soon as he gets to the CF). Thanks to the Matrix's 
foresight when giving Prowl this body, he has space to store them in 
his wrists, the daggers emerging blade-first on his command.

Wing Guns - Prowl has two guns mounted on the underside of each wing. 
The inside ones fire extra-large-mini-missiles that home in on their 
target using signature tracking and detonate on impact, and the 
outside ones are rapid-fire laser guns.



And any more weapons he happens to pick up.
